name: lut pack v1
description:
Applying LUTs in Premiere Pro
If you’re applying a single LUT to your footage, an easy approach is to use the Browse function and select the LUT from your downloads folder.
In Premiere Pro, open the Color workspace by clicking the Color tab at the top center of Premiere Pro.
Click on the clip you want to work with.
-In the Lumetri panel, open the Basic Correction tab.
-Under Basic Correction, select the Input LUT dropdown menu, and click on Browse.
-Go to the LUTs folder and select the LUT of your choice

short-description: color grading is one way to improve the appearance of your footage and serve your storytelling vision
